body:
Hi all I have improved LB SunriseSunset and now works very well! Also with EPW files of extrime location such as Alaska, Barrow. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/k4bPQ8WfDNjHi7PLy2YalwpacDslcwJW7AyeeT9X-5PqPrEifDIVHs-mLxPYWVuztGfDJGGQOzAe7xFGr5SZTk1FJEefYRZL/LB_sunrisesunset_01.png) I added a function that checks for the data input, and now it is possible connect whether Analysis Period or Ladybug DOY/HOY to the same input. Moreover I changed its name and added a new output suggested by Chris. (SunIsUp).
It is possible to use this new output to create cool sunlight charts, as you can see below. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/k4bPQ8WfDNjpA93U5KX7qzkw0Bm-kNdmjPHMztZe1K0jhaxndI49SfKTb3wAPVGyGx86oqMd7oNGNcnwTaaE1LG7Lp73wB*D/LB_sunrisesunset_01_ALASKA_BARROW.png) **Barrow, Alaska
** **[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/k4bPQ8WfDNjfu5Cr92v0JuOVJMTae30vzxuKpDzZKwkd5DQyLoYHsLuL*Go78hx4spVkamRYfZHCE4jSHgcI*d2nawZsJ9ru/LB_sunrisesunset_01_NEWZELAND.png)** **Invercargill, Southland, New Zealand
** **[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/k4bPQ8WfDNh6RE6W0X*bah219hZZX1ECoL0C-FrKDIhpC4e1eUJ5R1fxSWaKzVK3KBiGD5Wz44UlraMhireefolzk5iO8zy6/LB_sunrisesunset_01_CANADA.png)** **Lethbridge, Canada** Finally, the component is very fast. it takes about 10 seconds to calculate 8760 values! Best Antonello
